caseTitle: The Commissioner Inland Revenue, Faisalabad v. M/s. Mughal Board Industry, Faisalabad
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: The purpose of the amnesty scheme is to incentivize payment and collection of stuck-up revenue - A taxpayer who had made voluntary payment before the cutoff date under the amnesty scheme can avail the amnesty scheme.
